entry.title: Paper featured in CSME Bulletin
entry.content:
The paper Characteristics of undulatory locomotion in granular media is featured in the CSME1 Bulletin as a research highlight. In this paper, we employed a mathematical model to investigate the swimming characteristics of a sandfish lizard in a granular media.

Ultimately their research helps to understand how we can design biomimetic robots capable of efficient and precisely controlled motion through challenging environments, such as sand.

Read the CSME Bulletin here (page 12). Download a PDF of our paper or read it here.
